title: ContourROAM Waterproof HD 1080P Hands-free HD Camcorder Watersport Kit
description: The ContourROAM Watersports Kit is the all-in-one package that contains everything you need to capture beautiful action video while engaged in your favorite water-based sport. It includes the easy to use ContourROAM, a Surfboard Mount, and the ContourROAM Waterproof Case.
